pages.text: Much like the Deep Dark, the Undergarden is a dark, subterranean dimension located deep below the bedrock of the overworld. You will come across many mobs and many biomes. There's even a boss. You have plenty of exploring to do in this dimension.$(br2)In order to travel to the Undergarden, you must craft a Catalyst then create a frame in the shape of a nether
portal using stone bricks. Right click on the bricks like you would a flint and steel on obsidian.
